frequently-viewed-manuals.description: Each smoothing process in the SVS technology consists of several stages, including creating negative pressure in the chamber.

categories.heading: How can we help you with?

placeholders: is there a way to change the nozzle size?
How to change the nozzle size?
My screen of Zaxe X3 is frozen!

substances.heading: Filament stuck in hotend!
substances.description: Each smoothing process in the SVS technology consists of several stages, including creating negative pressure in the chamber or condensation of the solvent’s vapors. During each stage, the device has to keep full tightness of the chamber and solvent system to successfully complete the smoothing.
